title: Switch on Bigga
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Dept. of the Interior. Film Division, production company
Electricity Commission of New South Wales (N.S.W.), production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Australia - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Rural conditions
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Power resources - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Rural development - Australia
abstract: A short government produced film from 1953 about the arrival of electric power in Bigga.
description: A unique look at the coming of electric power to a small rural district in NSW and the benefits derived from electricity by the farmer and his family.  Includes a country style grand switching on ceremony.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002615; Country Living in Australia; Active; 2012
